channel.title: Ember Frontend App News
channel.description: Latest updates and news for the Frontend game launcher

item.title: Welcome to Ember Frontend v1.0
item.description: We are excited to launch the first version of our new game launcher! Enjoy a seamless experience with RetroAchievements integration and automatic metadata fetching.

item.title: Automatic Platform Updates
item.description: Your console configurations are now kept up-to-date automatically from our GitHub repository. No more manual JSON editing!

item.title: New Synchronization Feedback
item.description: Track all background tasks directly from the top bar. You can now see the exact progress of your library scans and metadata updates.

item.title: Sleep Mode Added
item.description: Quickly close the application using the new Power icon in the bottom dock.
